localize.text: 1. R Corp's 4th Pack can be called once per day.
2. R Corp's 4th Pack can be called to a maximum of 4 departments at once.
3. A maximum of 32 Rabbits and Reindeer, and a maximum of 16 Rhinos will be called.
4. The facility must provide a percentage of its current energy in increments of 25% for each department designated. If all 3 teams are designated, then 30% of energy will be paid.
5. In whichever departments R Corp's 4th Pack are called, R Corps's 4th Pack captains will assume all command, not the manager.
6. R Corp's 4th Pack will automatically withdraw when no hostile entities remain in the department.
- The department to which R Corp's 4th Pack is called will be completely sealed and blocked off; all employees currently in the department will immediately panic.
